problem.markdown:
Continue to review the Consistency - Time dashboard and select May 2020. Which district had a suspiciously high value for ANC 1 in May of 2020? >>Select the one correct answer: (2 attempts)<<
( ) A. A-1 ( ) B. B-1 ( ) C. C-1 (x) D. D-1 [explanation] The correct answer is D-1 [explanation]
